channel.title: Nature Communications
channel.description:
Nature Communications is an open access, multidisciplinary journal dedicated to publishing high-quality research in all areas of the biological, health, physical, chemical and Earth sciences. Papers published by the journal aim to represent important advances of significance to specialists within each field.

We are committed to providing an efficient service for both authors and readers. Our team of independent editors make rapid and fair publication decisions. Prompt dissemination of accepted papers to a wide readership and beyond is achieved through a programme of continuous online publication.

item.title: Friedel oscillations and chiral superconductivity in monolayer NbSe<sub>2</sub>
item.content:encoded:
Nature Communications, Published online: 05 September 2025; doi:10.1038/s41467-025-63319-z

The nature of the dominant pairing mechanism in some two-dimensional transition metal dichalcogenides is still debated. Here, the authors predict that the Kohn-Luttinger mechanism induces chiral p-wave superconductivity in monolayer NbSe2.
item.dc:title: Friedel oscillations and chiral superconductivity in monolayer NbSe<sub>2</sub>
item.dc:creator: Julian Siegl
Anton Bleibaum
Wen Wan
Marcin Kurpas
John Schliemann
Miguel M. Ugeda
Magdalena Marganska
Milena Grifoni

item.title: Transient domain boundary drives ultrafast magnetisation reversal
item.content:encoded:
Nature Communications, Published online: 05 September 2025; doi:10.1038/s41467-025-63571-3

The authors reveal that even within a few-nanometre thin films, ultrafast all-optical magnetisation switching is spatially inhomogeneous along the depth and driven by the picosecond propagation of a transient domain boundary.
item.dc:title: Transient domain boundary drives ultrafast magnetisation reversal
item.dc:creator: Martin Hennecke
Daniel Schick
Themistoklis P. H. Sidiropoulos
Jun-Xiao Lin
Zongxia Guo
Grégory Malinowski
Maximilian Mattern
Lutz Ehrentraut
Martin Schmidbauer
Matthias Schnuerer
Clemens von Korff Schmising
Stéphane Mangin
Michel Hehn
Stefan Eisebitt
